Link

Close share Copy link

View full details

The Dreamruns Helmet Speaker kit fits direct into any helmet with audio
pockets (most helmets nowadays) and has a small microphone and button for
phone calls. Save some money for "après ski" and get these helmet speakers at
a great price. The 40mm speaker drivers provide loud full fidelity sound for
music and crisp communication for calls. The 3.5mm plug will allow you to
connect virtually any cell phone, mp3 player or cassette player (for your 80s
mixtapes). The braided speaker cable provides outstanding durability. Speakers
can be disconnected from cable if you only want to use one (for better
hearing).

  * Cable Length: Approximately 27.5 inches from phone connector to speaker split. Approximate 12" length from speaker split to speaker connection for each speaker.
  * Speaker Case: Approximately 2.25" max diameter
  * Speaker Thickness: Approximately 9/16" thick
  * Warranty: 2 year product replacement warranty. Dreamruns/ Wireless Helmets is not responsible for any injury while using this product.
